title: Minecraft 基岩版 1.2.2 发布
author: zx728925
txt_content:
本帖最后由 zx728925 于 2017-10-5 15:22 编辑 

Minecraft 基岩版 是指包括Minecraft 手机版（Android、IOS）、Win10版（VR）、主机版（XboxOne、NS）在内的 使用“基岩引擎”（C++语言）开发的Minecraft 统一版本。
正式版是 Minecraft 基岩版 经过一段时间的测试版测试之后得到的稳定版本，也是众多材质、Addons和官方领域服会逐渐跟进的版本。与此同时Google Play、Win10 Store等官方软件商城也会推送次更新。
  转载本贴时须要注明原作者以及本帖地址。

修复的BUG（29个）

Fixed a crash that occurred when loading worlds修复了在加载世界时导致游戏崩溃的BUGFixed a crash when backing out from a menu using a controller if there was a setting toggled by touch or mouse/keyboard修复了在用设备（有一个切换触摸或者键鼠的设置）返回菜单时导致游戏崩溃的BUGFixed a crash when signing out of the safe area screen after switching to a new profile (Xbox One only)修复了在切换到新配置文件之后离开安全区域时导致游戏崩溃的BUG（仅限Xbox One）Fixed a crash that occurred in the World Settings screen修复了在进入世界设置时导致游戏崩溃的BUGFixed a crash that occurred when joining servers修复了在加入服务器时导致游戏崩溃的BUGFixed a crash related to inputting and rendering text (Xbox One only)修复了与输入和渲染文本有关的导致游戏崩溃的BUG（仅限Xbox One）Increased performance when navigating the main menu (Xbox One only)提高浏览主菜单时的性能（仅限Xbox One）Holding sneak and jump at the same time while flying will no longer drift slowly downward在飞行时，同时按住潜行和跳跃键时，不再缓慢向下漂移了Realms invite links now appear (Xbox One only)添加了领域邀请地址（仅限Xbox One）The cake is not a lie! On controller, the Recipe Book no longer says ingredients are missing when they are present in the inventory蛋糕不是个谎言！在设备上，当背包里有足够的原料时，配方书不会说缺少原料Redstone dust and components now properly show their active/inactive status红石及其红石物品现在能正确显示有效/无效状态Redstone components no longer freeze or trigger when reloading a world加载世界时，红石物品不再会不能触发或自动触发了Eggs thrown at other players will now cause knockback effect扔到其他玩家上的鸡蛋现在会造成击退效果All firework rockets can now be taken from the Recipe Book without disappearing所有烟花火箭从配方书中拿走时不会消失Resource packs are now applied to the main menu after restarting the game when the resource pack was previously added to Active Packs in the Global Resources menu资源包之前加入到全球资源包菜单中的常用包，然后重启游戏时，资源包会出现在主菜单里了Each player in split-screen now has appropriate lighting for the dimension they are in多屏幕中的每一个玩家现在都有适当大小的光照了Fixed issue of Efficiency III diamond pickaxes not continually mining blocks that are fast to mine, such as netherrack修复了带有效率3附魔的钻石镐不会持续快速地挖掘方块（比如地狱岩）的BUGMending enchantment will now work properly with fishing rods修复了钓鱼竿的附魔，现在钓鱼竿能正常使用了Using commands or Pick Block to get Shulker boxes no longer displays the placeholder name使用指令或者Pick Block获取潜影盒时不再会显示占位符的名字Mob heads can now be equipped if the stack contains more than one when using a touch screen使用触摸屏时，如果堆叠超过一个，那么生物的头可以装备Ladders placed on other ladders or slabs will no longer be invisible放在其他梯子或台阶上的梯子不再会消失Pressing the left thumbstick will now toggle the Recipe Book on if it was closed如果配方书关闭了，按住左摇杆会切换合成书Recipe Book now updates properly when opening and the Craftable toggle is off当打开以及可合成的物品的切换关闭时，配方书能正确更新了Armors of the same type will now visually switch properly in armor slots on Classic UI在经典用户界面中的盔甲槽里，能正确地切换同种盔甲了Fixed the B Button not closing the settings menu when a
